strIntroduction: Step back in time with a tour to Bruges, one of the best preserved medieval towns in Europe.
strTitle: 1 Day in Bruges from Paris

strIntroduction: This three-day pass allows you to discover Paris by Open Tour bus and Batobus boat at your own pace. Your unlimited three-day pass gives you the freedom to discover Paris and enjoy commentary about Paris's key monuments.
strTitle: 3 Day Hop on Hop off Bus and Boat Pass

strIntroduction: Spend a delightful day exploring the towns of the French Riviera and the Provençal countryside on a private tour from Nice. Cruise down the iconic Boulevard de la Croisette and see the Film Festival Palace in Cannes, and tour a perfumery in sweet-smelling Grasse. Drive through the gorgeous Loup Gorges and take in sweeping views of the Alps and the Mediterranean from medieval Gourdon. Finally, stroll through the picturesque lanes of artsy Saint-Paul-de-Vence. Enjoy a leisurely pace and the personalized attention of your private guide.
strTitle: Countryside Private Day Trip

strIntroduction: This fantastic half day excursion (morning or afternoon) gives you an opportunity to discover Paris's famous tourist sights and monuments. It includes lunch at the restaurant on the 1st floor of the Eiffel Tower, a city tour by panoramic coach, and an hour-long cruise along the Seine. Experience the beauty and heritage of the French capital in three different ways.
strTitle: Tour of Paris, Seine Cruise, and Lunch at the Eiffel Tower

strIntroduction: Montmartre village, so famous for its bohemian life and its top-ranked artists as Picasso and Renoir, has kept its soul beyond the legend.
strTitle: Montmartre local gastronomy tour

strIntroduction: A taste of real Italy and its wonderful open air markets, famous for leather goods, accessories and fashion!
strTitle: Private Tour: Italian Riviera by Minivan from Nice

strIntroduction: 尼斯譽為最浪漫的南法蔚藍海岸，享受愜意的度假風情與一年四季的幸福陽光！

strIntroduction: Welcome to join a very particular 2 day group tour around Avignon, visiting the l’Occitane Museum and enjoying lavander aroma!
strTitle: Lavander Tour

strIntroduction: Varied itinerary covering all the main attractions of the Normandy region. Learn about history, architecture and local culinary specialties.
strTitle: 2 Day Trip to Normandy, Saint Malo & Mont Saint Michel from Paris

strIntroduction: A sim card that that can travel around 11 different European countries and can fulfill all your needs like: high-speed net work, videos, internet calls, all which have unlimited flow rates!
strTitle: Europe Prepaid Sim Card

strIntroduction: Welcome to Palais Royal and Opera Garnier Walk.Our walk will take us to the Palais Royal, through Little Tokyo, into covered passages, and to the oldest Opera house in Paris
strTitle: Walking Guided Tour : From Palais Royal to Opera Garnier

strIntroduction: This full day excursion from Paris takes you to the two magnificent châteaux of Vaux le Vicomte and Fontainebleau, both located around one hour from Paris.
strTitle: Day Trip to Fontainebleau & Vaux le Vicomte

strIntroduction: Walk into gourmet Paris during this 2 hours and a half tour in Les Halles-Montorgueil area "The Belly of Paris".
strTitle: Gourmet food tour in Central Paris - Les Halles/Montorgueil quarter

strIntroduction: A full day to discover Paris. Discover the famous monuments and sites. Have a lunch cruise on Seine River. Visit the well - known Eiffel Tower.
strTitle: Paris City Tour by Minivan, Lunch Seine Cruise, Eiffel Tower

strIntroduction: Discover the origins of Paris on a 2-hour movie locations walk around the 2 islands at the heart of the city, and explore the city from the inside out. Learn about Notre Dame, hear about infamous gangsters, try some of the city’s best cupcakes, and more.
strTitle: Paris TV Movie Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Le Marais is a renovated old neighbourhood of Paris, right in the center, that reveals a mix of magnificient historical mansions, cutting edge fashion boutiques and lively restaurants.
strTitle: Trendy and sumptuous Marais

strIntroduction: Discover both the contemporary and the historical sides of Paris by cycling along with your professional guide
strTitle: Past and present Paris by bike

strIntroduction: Spend a half-day exploring the unforgettable attractions of Versailles, the extraordinary gardens and opulent palace that are both on UNESCO's list of World Heritage Sites.
strTitle: Skip the Line: Versailles Half-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Enter into another world and see a different side of Paris: the most energetic, colourful, lively and cosmopolitan market in the city.
strTitle: Paris's daily market tour: Aligre market

strIntroduction: Attend the final match to experience the most exciting games of UEFA Euro. To see which team will be the champion in 2016!
strTitle: 2016 UEFA EURO－Winner Match 49 VS Winner Match 50

strIntroduction: Bask in the unique allure of Saint Tropez on a small-group day trip from Nice. Gaze at luxury yachts, shop in trendy boutiques, pause for a sip in a terrace cafe and enjoy lots of fabulous people-watching.
strTitle: Saint Tropez Private Day Trip

strIntroduction: Hop over the channel and meet the neighbours with a day excursion to historic London on the Eurostar. From Paris the train glides through the world’s longest undersea tunnel, the Channel Tunnel. Taking eight years and £4.650 billion to build, the tunnel finally opened in 1994 and now transports thousands of passengers every day.
strTitle: London at your leisure from Paris

strIntroduction: This delicious tour will take you in a journey through the French culinary arts which are famous around the world.
strTitle: Paris Gourmet tour

strIntroduction: PARIS---The romance, the elegance, and the beauty Take time out to explore the paris with hop on-hop off bus tour of the city.
strTitle: Big Bus Paris Hop on - Hop off Bus Tour

strIntroduction: A suggestive and interesting tour around the must-see villages of Provence. Enjoy the history, art and nature that only this area in France
strTitle: The lavander Road : Gordes, Senaque & Sault

strIntroduction: Enjoy Paris like never before under its evening illuminations, and cruise the city streets in a vintage French convertible; a Citroen 2CV! Drive down the famous Champs Elysees and see the Eiffel Tower’s glittering lights.
strTitle: Paris by 2CV - Champs Elysees

strIntroduction: Enjoy a cruise on Seine river, and then participate in a night city tour in Paris. You can see some of the most famous sites of Paris in a brand-new way, leave the most romantic experience.

strIntroduction: Dine luxuriously aboard a glass canopy restaurant boat. Go on a cruise on the Seine River and catch the best sights of Paris at night. Enjoy a delectable three-course meal prepared only by the expert hands of a talented chef.

strIntroduction: This privately arranged 3 hour fashion and style treat in the very heart of Paris, the world's Fashion Capital can be booked as a private and exclusive treat for you alone or with a small group of your fashion mad girlfriends or boyfriends.

strIntroduction: Take a day trip to Mont Saint-Michel, a small rocky island off the coast of Normandy, and discover the beauty and charm of this unique spot at your own pace. Take in the history of this UNESCO World Heritage Site and explore its famous gothic abbey.

strIntroduction: Add a new element of fun to your Paris visit and head to Disneyland Paris and/or Walt Disney Studios on a 1-day ticket. Travel from the city center by RER A train, with the 40-minute journey leaving you off right in front of the amusement park.

strIntroduction: Experience panoramic views over Nice! On the Middle Corniche, stop at Eze – a perched medieval village, with its crafts shops and breathtaking views. Take a guided tour of a perfumery, the true essence of Provence. Visit the Old Town of Monaco.

strIntroduction: Head south of Paris for an exceptional evening at Vaux-le-Vicomte ! An exceptional evening awaits you in this 17th century masterpiece which inspired Louis XIV to create Versailles.
strTitle: Dinner & Candlelight Visit of Vaux le Vicomte

strIntroduction: Enjoy this 2-hour private guided tour of Orsay Museum with the special focus on museum s history and architecture and the 19th century art.

strIntroduction: Experience an unforgettable guided tour from Paris that immerses you in the history of two beautiful french castles: the Château de Vaux Le Vicomte which inspired the construction of the Palace of Versailles and the magnificent Château de Fontainebleau.
strTitle: Guided Visit of Vaux le Vicomte and Fontainebleau Châteaux

strIntroduction: Discover the wealth of natural beauty and historical significance during this visit to the Normandy Landing Beaches. This is a journey along the stunning French coastland, and into the poignant past of the region. A tour of particular significance for war veterans, their families and those interested in the period of World War II, it is also an opportunity for others to visit the Normandy region with its beautiful landscapes.
strTitle: Normandy landing beaches from Paris

strIntroduction: Savor a memorable night out in Paris with a gourmet dinner cruise along the River Seine. Float past the city’s famed monuments like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral aboard a luxury Bateaux Parisiens riverboat. Soak up the magic of the City of Lights from an onboard dining room while enjoying a gourmet three-course meal. Champagne and live music completes the perfectly Parisian atmosphere!
strTitle: Dinner Cruise with Live Music - Bateaux Parisiens

strIntroduction: Steep yourself in the fabulous wine-growing region of Burgundy, with its rolling vineyards and beautiful medieval villages. You’ll learn all about the local history and viticulture traditions from your expert and personable guide and sample one of the world’s finest white wines.

strIntroduction: Rooting for the four best teams. Just book tickets to watch this exciting game!

strIntroduction: Full day excursion from Paris to the city of Reims and its region, known all over the world for the production of Champagne.

strIntroduction: You’ll find all the charm of a typical Provencal way of life mixed with an artistic environment that is still perceivable in these cities

strIntroduction: Spend an evening at the Lido in Paris, enthralled by the Paris Merveilles show! Marvel at the precision and the energy of the dancing of the Bluebell Girls and the Lido Boys, and their stunning costumes, as you enjoy a half bottle of Champagne.

strIntroduction: Indulge yourself with an evening of sightseeing, dinner and music on the River Seine.

strIntroduction: Rooting for the four best teams. Just book tickets to watch this exciting game!

strIntroduction: Visit Paris by night in a double-decker bus. Discover the main monuments of Paris and the quarters, the bridges over the illuminated Seine river, the magic "City of Lights".

strIntroduction: Journey with us to the hill of marvellous Montmartre on one of our luxurious spacious coaches. Once there you will be able to continue to the top of the hill via cable-car or minibus, both of which offer a splendid view of the surrounding area near the Sacré-Coeur Basilica, one of the highest points in Paris.

strIntroduction: Experience the romance of Paris with an unforgettable night out that combines three of the top tours in the City of Lights.

strIntroduction: Experience a guided tour to the 1916 Somme Battlefields and follow the route. This special itinerary of the “Circuit du Souvenir” will take you to the main battlefields and historical sites of the region.

strIntroduction: To improve your knowledge of french wines, we offer you a Master Class Tasting with a french oenological teacher. With a selection of 5 wines and the help of a tutorial, the teacher will provide you the differents skills!

strIntroduction: Make your night in Paris one to remember with this spectacular Seine river cruise and Moulin Rouge combination.

strIntroduction: Step behind the counter of a typical beautiful French bakery, a boulangerie, into the kitchen to watch a demonstration by the master baker of how a perfect baguette is made.

strIntroduction: Meet at 9:15 am with Chef Dominique, our cooking teacher, in his apartment located at the border of the 11th and 20th district. You start with a morning market visit to purchase the requested produce for today's recipes.
strTitle: Market Visit and Cooking Class with Chef Dominique

strIntroduction: With your driver-guide, discover the major sites of Paris: Notre-Dame Cathedral, the Eiffel Tower and Montmartre and the Palace of Versaille.

strIntroduction: Hope to spend more days in Disneyland? Now it's your turn to make dreams come true! Come to plan a trip in Paris and enjoy the wonderful world of Disney.

strIntroduction: Book your airport transfer from CDG Airport to your centrally located Paris hotel (postcode beginning with 75 only) !
strTitle: Paris Shared Arrival / Departure Transfer: CDG Airport

strIntroduction: See firsthand the bustling kitchen of a famous macaron and chocolate shop in Paris. During this 1-hour behind-the-scenes tour, meet the head pastry chef and master chocolatier. Even better, taste different macarons and gourmet chocolates as you hear about the techniques that go into the world-renowned art of Parisian chocolate and macaron making.
strTitle: Gérard Mulot macaron and chocolate workshop

strIntroduction: Admire the waterfront sights of Paris while enjoying a 3-course meal on this Seine River dinner cruise. Aboard a La Marina de Paris glass-enclosed boat, you’ll float along the river, admiring illuminated landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre and Notre Dame Cathedral. Pass under the Pont Neuf and other bridges while you sip French wine and Champagne. Unlike similar tours, this one includes transport for your convenience.
strTitle: Gourmet Dinner Cruise "Saveurs Menu" - La Marina with transport

strIntroduction: Here's a cooking class with a difference - a rare opportunity to go behind the counter of a friendly family local Parisian bakery. We go into the kitchen to learn how to create French baguettes and croissants. Our teacher and demonstrator will be the baker himself.
strTitle: Bread-making class with a baker

strIntroduction: See what one of the most famous museums in the world has to offer with a tour of the Louvre Museum.
strTitle: Audio-Guided Visit of the Louvre Museum

strIntroduction: Discover the tragedy of Verdun – a landscape scarred by one of WWI's bloodiest battles. The day tour covers the Fort and Ossuary of Douaumont, the Trench of Bayonets, the Meuse-Argonne US Cemetery, and the key battlefields among other places of interest.
strTitle: Verdun and Argonne battlefields

strIntroduction: Pop a cork in France’s famous Champagne region on a full-day tour from Paris!
strTitle: A day in Champagne

strIntroduction: A fun 3 hour fashion and style treat in the very heart of Paris, the world's Fashion Capital. Your friendly Parisian Fashionista guide will be your inspiration in unlocking the secrets of the Parisian sense of cool style and chic glamour.
strTitle: French Fashion, Fragrance and Fun

strIntroduction: A great way to begin your visit to Paris, you’ll see Notre Dame, the Louvre, the Eiffel Tower and loads more on this small-group bike tour.

strIntroduction: Fall in love with Paris with this full day tour that will take you to two of the most iconic sights in the city.

strIntroduction: After the cruise on the Seine River, we have booked you the best tables in the restaurant “Chez Clément” on the Champs-Élysées, one of the most fashionable of our capital city.

strIntroduction: Learn the art of French seduction on a 2-hour walking tour of Montmartre in Paris, the city of love and romance. You'll be introduced to the most charming secret locations where romance blossomed.

strIntroduction: Improve your French in Paris, the courses will be followed by a guided tour of the area.

strIntroduction: Set off from our Central Paris agency at 6 pm for a magical evening at the Palace of Versailles and its gardens

strIntroduction: Take a journey into the heart of medieval and Gothic Paris on a 2-hour guided tour. Visit the Notre Dame Cathedral, its famous bell towers, and climb 387 steps for a dramatic view over the entire city of Paris. Explore the beautiful Ile de la Cité.

strIntroduction: What pairs magnificently with art? Wine, of course. On this one-of-a-kind tour, you can get the best of both.

strIntroduction: The upscale neighborhood of Saint-Germain-des-Prés is a premier fashion district in Paris, and also home to upscale shops featuring hand-made sweets. Taste the trends in chocolates, pastry, and bread, offered up by exceptional gastronomic craftsmen.
strTitle: Chocolate & pastry food tour

strIntroduction: The ideal way to discover Paris for the first time. Visit Place Vendôme Square, the Orsay Museum, Place de la Concorde Square, the Opera House, the Pantheon, the Luxembourg Palace and Gardens, the Champs-Elysées, the Arc de Triomphe, and the Invalides within 3 hours. In the end, View the beautiful skyline of Paris from the 2nd floor of Eiffel Tower！
strTitle: Paris Tour and Visit to the Eiffel Tower
Marseille Electric Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Discover the very best of the Latin Quarter of Paris! Saint-Germain-des-Prés is one the most visited and appreciated areas of Paris. Learn about the history and discover various boutiques for the best experience of the area.
strTitle: Lifestyle tour in Saint-Germain-des-Prés

strIntroduction: Sail across Seine river to see the illuminated sites of Paris, and at end of the cruise, get on a coach for a transfer to the Moulin Rouge. Then, enjoy the most famous show of Moulin Rouge, Féerie.

strIntroduction: Enjoy a pleasant and wonderful evening on a "La Marina de Paris" boat. Admire the illuminations of Paris during a cruise on the Seine river for 2 hours, while you have a delicious dinner, typical french gastronomy. Magic night with the dinner cruise menu "saveurs".

strIntroduction: Take Euro Star and explore Paris within 2 days. Visit Arc de Triomphe, Notre Dame and Champs Elysees. Having lunch on the Eiffel Tower and cruise on the River Seine.

strIntroduction: Located in the north of Paris, Les Puces is known as one of the largest Flea Market in the world. For a fun-filled weekend, it’s one of the best place to go for shopping in Paris.

strIntroduction: Get the best views of Paris from the 56th floor of the Montparnasse Tower. Enjoy the extraordinary city panoramas from the highest open-air roof terrace in the French capital.

strIntroduction: Step back in time with this full day tour of the beautiful Loire valley and some of its most impressive chateaux. See rolling countryside, fairytale castles and stop for lunch at a charming centuries-old inn.

strIntroduction: One small corner of Paris still holds out against the invading hordes – and your friends Asterix and Obelix are leading the resistance.

strIntroduction: Discover two popular attractions in northwest France with professional tour guides.
strTitle: 2 Day Trip to Mont Saint Michel and Loire Valley Castles from Paris - Hotel Transfers

strIntroduction: With two different theme parks, Disneyland Paris will make your dreams come true twice! Your Disneyland Paris Celebration Ticket – a 1 Day 2 Park Hopper – is superb value, allowing one day’s admission to both Disneyland Park and Walt Disney Studios Park with the freedom to hop between both Disney Parks as often as you like.
strTitle: Disneyland Paris: 1 Day 2 Parks - Pickup & Drop off Hotel

strIntroduction: This night-time adventure includes a once-in-a-lifetime dinner on the first floor of the city's and a magical cruise along the Seine.
strTitle: Dinner at the Eiffel Tower with Skip-the-Line Access + Seine River Cruise

strIntroduction: Skip the long lines for taxis, or the hassle of navigating public transport upon arrival at Airport, and enjoy a private, chauffeur driven transfer to your city hotel in a stylish, comfortable vehicle!
